text: Sekaraia mba buni suaŋgim, mba tar zumgum vhuuv, Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararav nta khothɨgap, guigira khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap Fhe Bakɨme buni zɨn vui. Ana Fhe Bakɨme buni zɨn vov, gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen kav kav, thav kɨrar hɨgap, mba Fhe Bakɨme ana suaŋgi buni, ana nta bun Isreran ki gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai.
